error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'cost_trucks_caps' (value: 60) was used instead of 'remaining_caps_after_trucks' (value: 40).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 19
The trucks cost 60 bottle caps because 10 x 6 = <<10*6=60>>60
He has 40 bottle caps left because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
He spends 45 bottle caps on cars because 60 x 0.75 = <<60*0.75=45>>45
He gets 9 cars with this because 45 / 5 = <<45/5=9>>9
He gets 19 vehicles in total because 10 + 9 = <<10+9=19>>19
